title: The Probability of a Total Solar Eclipse
subject: Astrophysics
preview: The Moon is just the right size and distance to cause a total solar eclipse. In this blog I explore the probability of this seeming coincidence.

title: A Better Voting Compass with AI
subject: Programming/Politics
preview: In the lead up to the 2025 election I set out to quantify my political beliefs. Using AI and some linear algebra I created a better voting compass.
